channel.title: News on ubIQio
channel.description: Recent content in News on ubIQio

item.title: All Screwed Up
item.description:
Ardhat is perfect for automotive use, and we now have DC jack to screw terminals adapters in the store so you can easily hook up an Ardhat to a car or RV system.

Ardhat is protected against reverse connections, and its high efficiency switching regulator will run happily at up to 28V.

And there’s plenty of current in hand to drive things like 5V led strips, so go pimp your ride!

item.title: Ardhat Pre-Order
item.description:
Huzzah!

After many months of hard work by Ardhat’s contributors, we’re excited to announce that Ardhat is now available to pre-order!

There’s 3 flavours to choose from, not including Champagne.

Head over to the shop and order yours today!!

item.title: ubIQio Magazine now on Flipboard!
item.description:
The ubIQio magazine Maker Planet is full of awesome projects and news related to Ardhat.

Hit the link below for inspiration!

View my Flipboard Magazine.
